findings.title: Potential division by zero
findings.description: On L188 `total` could be zero; if so, the transaction will revert and taking the snapshot will fail for all pools.

findings.title: A user can increase their shares arbitrarily
findings.description: The function `registerAllClaims` can be called by anyone at any time, allowing one to call the function multiple times to increase its ratio of `memberClaimInEra totalClaimsInEra`. This is because `L244` accumulates based on the input amount.
